sayings: Without my body, I'm a nobody.
I'm hungrier than a green snake in a sugar cane field.
When push comes to shove, you've got to do what you love, even if it's not a good idea.
Like my granny used to say back in her tar paper shack on Montego Bay, 'If you want a box thrown into the sun, you got to do it yourself.' God rest her zombie bones.
That's a calculator. I ate it to gain its power.
Sweet giant anteater of Santa Anita!
